fields.description:
Sliders, added to Navbar, Toolbar and Title do not respond to touch, as expected.

Test steps:
1. Install and run KS> Cotrols> Slider> Basic
2. Toggle Slider in Navbar,Toggle Slider in Toolbar, Toggle Slider in Title
3. Try to move sliders' thumbs

Actual result:
Sliders do not respond to touch

Expected:
A value of sliders should be changed
fields.summary: iOS7: Slider - slider, added to title, navbar or toolbar, does not respond to touch
